raygui.h

1/*******************************************************************************************
2*
3* raygui v3.2 - A simple and easy-to-use immediate-mode gui library
4*
5* DESCRIPTION:
6*
7* raygui is a tools-dev-focused immediate-mode-gui library based on raylib but also
8* available as a standalone library, as long as input and drawing functions are provided.
9*
10* Controls provided:
11*
12* # Container/separators Controls
13* - WindowBox --> StatusBar, Panel
14* - GroupBox --> Line
15* - Line
16* - Panel --> StatusBar
17* - ScrollPanel --> StatusBar
18*
19* # Basic Controls
20* - Label
21* - Button
22* - LabelButton --> Label
23* - Toggle
24* - ToggleGroup --> Toggle
25* - CheckBox
26* - ComboBox
27* - DropdownBox
28* - TextBox
29* - TextBoxMulti
30* - ValueBox --> TextBox
31* - Spinner --> Button, ValueBox
32* - Slider
33* - SliderBar --> Slider
34* - ProgressBar
35* - StatusBar
36* - DummyRec
37* - Grid
38*
39* # Advance Controls
40* - ListView
41* - ColorPicker --> ColorPanel, ColorBarHue
42* - MessageBox --> Window, Label, Button
43* - TextInputBox --> Window, Label, TextBox, Button
44*
45* It also provides a set of functions for styling the controls based on its properties (size, color).
46*
47*
48* RAYGUI STYLE (guiStyle):
49*
50* raygui uses a global data array for all gui style properties (allocated on data segment by default),
51* when a new style is loaded, it is loaded over the global style... but a default gui style could always be
52* recovered with GuiLoadStyleDefault() function, that overwrites the current style to the default one
53*
54* The global style array size is fixed and depends on the number of controls and properties:
55*
56* static unsigned int guiStyle[RAYGUI_MAX_CONTROLS*(RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE + RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED)];
57*
58* guiStyle size is by default: 16*(16 + 8) = 384*4 = 1536 bytes = 1.5 KB
59*
60* Note that the first set of BASE properties (by default guiStyle[0..15]) belong to the generic style
61* used for all controls, when any of those base values is set, it is automatically populated to all
62* controls, so, specific control values overwriting generic style should be set after base values.
63*
64* After the first BASE set we have the EXTENDED properties (by default guiStyle[16..23]), those
65* properties are actually common to all controls and can not be overwritten individually (like BASE ones)
66* Some of those properties are: TEXT_SIZE, TEXT_SPACING, LINE_COLOR, BACKGROUND_COLOR
67*
68* Custom control properties can be defined using the EXTENDED properties for each independent control.
69*
70* TOOL: rGuiStyler is a visual tool to customize raygui style.
71*
72*
73* RAYGUI ICONS (guiIcons):
74*
75* raygui could use a global array containing icons data (allocated on data segment by default),
76* a custom icons set could be loaded over this array using GuiLoadIcons(), but loaded icons set
77* must be same RAYGUI_ICON_SIZE and no more than RAYGUI_ICON_MAX_ICONS will be loaded
78*
79* Every icon is codified in binary form, using 1 bit per pixel, so, every 16x16 icon
80* requires 8 integers (16*16/32) to be stored in memory.
81*
82* When the icon is draw, actually one quad per pixel is drawn if the bit for that pixel is set.
83*
84* The global icons array size is fixed and depends on the number of icons and size:
85*
86* static unsigned int guiIcons[RAYGUI_ICON_MAX_ICONS*RAYGUI_ICON_DATA_ELEMENTS];
87*
88* guiIcons size is by default: 256*(16*16/32) = 2048*4 = 8192 bytes = 8 KB
89*
90* TOOL: rGuiIcons is a visual tool to customize raygui icons.
91*
92*
93* CONFIGURATION:
94*
95* #define RAYGUI_IMPLEMENTATION
96* Generates the implementation of the library into the included file.
97* If not defined, the library is in header only mode and can be included in other headers
98* or source files without problems. But only ONE file should hold the implementation.
99*
100* #define RAYGUI_STANDALONE
101* Avoid raylib.h header inclusion in this file. Data types defined on raylib are defined
102* internally in the library and input management and drawing functions must be provided by
103* the user (check library implementation for further details).
104*
105* #define RAYGUI_NO_ICONS
106* Avoid including embedded ricons data (256 icons, 16x16 pixels, 1-bit per pixel, 2KB)
107*
108* #define RAYGUI_CUSTOM_ICONS
109* Includes custom ricons.h header defining a set of custom icons,
110* this file can be generated using rGuiIcons tool
111*
112*
113* VERSIONS HISTORY:
114* 3.2 (22-May-2022) RENAMED: Some enum values, for unification, avoiding prefixes
115* REMOVED: GuiScrollBar(), only internal
116* REDESIGNED: GuiPanel() to support text parameter

119* REDESIGNED: GuiColorPanel() to support text parameter
120* REDESIGNED: GuiColorBarAlpha() to support text parameter
121* REDESIGNED: GuiColorBarHue() to support text parameter
122* REDESIGNED: GuiTextInputBox() to support password
123* 3.1 (12-Jan-2022) REVIEWED: Default style for consistency (aligned with rGuiLayout v2.5 tool)
124* REVIEWED: GuiLoadStyle() to support compressed font atlas image data and unload previous textures

205// Function specifiers in case library is build/used as a shared library (Windows)
206// NOTE: Microsoft specifiers to tell compiler that symbols are imported/exported from a .dll
207#if defined(_WIN32)
208 #if defined(BUILD_LIBTYPE_SHARED)
209 #define RAYGUIAPI __declspec(dllexport) // We are building the library as a Win32 shared library (.dll)
210 #elif defined(USE_LIBTYPE_SHARED)
211 #define RAYGUIAPI __declspec(dllimport) // We are using the library as a Win32 shared library (.dll)
212 #endif
213#endif

234// Simple log system to avoid printf() calls if required
235// NOTE: Avoiding those calls, also avoids const strings memory usage
236#define RAYGUI_SUPPORT_LOG_INFO

255 // Vector2 type
256 typedef struct Vector2 {
257 float x;
258 float y;
259 } Vector2;
260
261 // Vector3 type // -- ConvertHSVtoRGB(), ConvertRGBtoHSV()
262 typedef struct Vector3 {
263 float x;
264 float y;
265 float z;
266 } Vector3;
267
268 // Color type, RGBA (32bit)
269 typedef struct Color {
270 unsigned char r;
271 unsigned char g;
272 unsigned char b;
273 unsigned char a;
274 } Color;
275
276 // Rectangle type
277 typedef struct Rectangle {
278 float x;
279 float y;
280 float width;
281 float height;
282 } Rectangle;
283
284 // TODO: Texture2D type is very coupled to raylib, required by Font type
285 // It should be redesigned to be provided by user
286 typedef struct Texture2D {
287 unsigned int id; // OpenGL texture id
288 int width; // Texture base width
289 int height; // Texture base height
290 int mipmaps; // Mipmap levels, 1 by default
291 int format; // Data format (PixelFormat type)
292 } Texture2D;
293
294 // GlyphInfo, font characters glyphs info
295 typedef struct GlyphInfo {
296 int value; // Character value (Unicode)
297 int offsetX; // Character offset X when drawing
298 int offsetY; // Character offset Y when drawing
299 int advanceX; // Character advance position X
300 Image image; // Character image data
301 } GlyphInfo;
302
303 // TODO: Font type is very coupled to raylib, mostly required by GuiLoadStyle()
304 // It should be redesigned to be provided by user
305 typedef struct Font {
306 int baseSize; // Base size (default chars height)
307 int glyphCount; // Number of characters
308 Texture2D texture; // Characters texture atlas
309 Rectangle *recs; // Characters rectangles in texture
310 GlyphInfo *chars; // Characters info data
311 } Font;
312#endif

325 STATE_PRESSED,
326 STATE_DISABLED,

336// Gui controls
337typedef enum {
338 // Default -> populates to all controls when set
339 DEFAULT = 0,
340 // Basic controls
341 LABEL, // Used also for: LABELBUTTON
342 BUTTON,
343 TOGGLE, // Used also for: TOGGLEGROUP
344 SLIDER, // Used also for: SLIDERBAR
345 PROGRESSBAR,
346 CHECKBOX,
347 COMBOBOX,
348 DROPDOWNBOX,
349 TEXTBOX, // Used also for: TEXTBOXMULTI
350 VALUEBOX,
351 SPINNER, // Uses: BUTTON, VALUEBOX
352 LISTVIEW,
353 COLORPICKER,
354 SCROLLBAR,
355 STATUSBAR
356} GuiControl;
357
358// Gui base properties for every control
359// NOTE: RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE properties (by default 16 properties)
360typedef enum {
361 BORDER_COLOR_NORMAL = 0,
362 BASE_COLOR_NORMAL,
363 TEXT_COLOR_NORMAL,
364 BORDER_COLOR_FOCUSED,
365 BASE_COLOR_FOCUSED,
366 TEXT_COLOR_FOCUSED,
367 BORDER_COLOR_PRESSED,
368 BASE_COLOR_PRESSED,
369 TEXT_COLOR_PRESSED,
370 BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED,
371 BASE_COLOR_DISABLED,
372 TEXT_COLOR_DISABLED,
373 BORDER_WIDTH,
374 TEXT_PADDING,
375 TEXT_ALIGNMENT,
376 RESERVED
377} GuiControlProperty;
378
379// Gui extended properties depend on control
380// NOTE: RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED properties (by default 8 properties)
381//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
382
383// DEFAULT extended properties
384// NOTE: Those properties are common to all controls or global
385typedef enum {
386 TEXT_SIZE = 16, // Text size (glyphs max height)
387 TEXT_SPACING, // Text spacing between glyphs
388 LINE_COLOR, // Line control color
389 BACKGROUND_COLOR, // Background color
390} GuiDefaultProperty;

442typedef enum {
443 TEXT_INNER_PADDING = 16, // TextBox/TextBoxMulti/ValueBox/Spinner inner text padding
444 TEXT_LINES_SPACING, // TextBoxMulti lines separation
445} GuiTextBoxProperty;
446
447// Spinner
448typedef enum {
449 SPIN_BUTTON_WIDTH = 16, // Spinner left/right buttons width
450 SPIN_BUTTON_SPACING, // Spinner buttons separation
451} GuiSpinnerProperty;

453// ListView
454typedef enum {
455 LIST_ITEMS_HEIGHT = 16, // ListView items height
456 LIST_ITEMS_SPACING, // ListView items separation
457 SCROLLBAR_WIDTH, // ListView scrollbar size (usually width)
458 SCROLLBAR_SIDE, // ListView scrollbar side (0-left, 1-right)
459} GuiListViewProperty;

466 HUEBAR_SELECTOR_HEIGHT, // ColorPicker right hue bar selector height
467 HUEBAR_SELECTOR_OVERFLOW // ColorPicker right hue bar selector overflow
468} GuiColorPickerProperty;

486// Global gui state control functions
487RAYGUIAPI void GuiEnable(void); // Enable gui controls (global state)
488RAYGUIAPI void GuiDisable(void); // Disable gui controls (global state)
489RAYGUIAPI void GuiLock(void); // Lock gui controls (global state)
490RAYGUIAPI void GuiUnlock(void); // Unlock gui controls (global state)
491RAYGUIAPI bool GuiIsLocked(void); // Check if gui is locked (global state)
492RAYGUIAPI void GuiFade(float alpha); // Set gui controls alpha (global state), alpha goes from 0.0f to 1.0f
493RAYGUIAPI void GuiSetState(int state); // Set gui state (global state)
494RAYGUIAPI int GuiGetState(void); // Get gui state (global state)
495
496// Font set/get functions
497RAYGUIAPI void GuiSetFont(Font font); // Set gui custom font (global state)
498RAYGUIAPI Font GuiGetFont(void); // Get gui custom font (global state)
499
500// Style set/get functions
501RAYGUIAPI void GuiSetStyle(int control, int property, int value); // Set one style property
502RAYGUIAPI int GuiGetStyle(int control, int property); // Get one style property
503
504// Container/separator controls, useful for controls organization
505RAYGUIAPI bool GuiWindowBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *title); // Window Box control, shows a window that can be closed
506RAYGUIAPI void GuiGroupBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Group Box control with text name
507RAYGUIAPI void GuiLine(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Line separator control, could contain text
508RAYGUIAPI void GuiPanel(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Panel control, useful to group controls
509RAYGUIAPI Rectangle GuiScrollPanel(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, Rectangle content, Vector2 *scroll); // Scroll Panel control
510
511// Basic controls set
512RAYGUIAPI void GuiLabel(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Label control, shows text
513RAYGUIAPI bool GuiButton(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Button control, returns true when clicked
514RAYGUIAPI bool GuiLabelButton(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Label button control, show true when clicked
515RAYGUIAPI bool GuiToggle(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, bool active); // Toggle Button control, returns true when active
516RAYGUIAPI int GuiToggleGroup(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int active); // Toggle Group control, returns active toggle index
517RAYGUIAPI bool GuiCheckBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, bool checked); // Check Box control, returns true when active
518RAYGUIAPI int GuiComboBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int active); // Combo Box control, returns selected item index
519RAYGUIAPI bool GuiDropdownBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int *active, bool editMode); // Dropdown Box control, returns selected item
520RAYGUIAPI bool GuiSpinner(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int *value, int minValue, int maxValue, bool editMode); // Spinner control, returns selected value
521RAYGUIAPI bool GuiValueBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int *value, int minValue, int maxValue, bool editMode); // Value Box control, updates input text with numbers
522RAYGUIAPI bool GuiTextBox(Rectangle bounds, char *text, int textSize, bool editMode); // Text Box control, updates input text
523RAYGUIAPI bool GuiTextBoxMulti(Rectangle bounds, char *text, int textSize, bool editMode); // Text Box control with multiple lines
524RAYGUIAPI float GuiSlider(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue); // Slider control, returns selected value
525RAYGUIAPI float GuiSliderBar(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue); // Slider Bar control, returns selected value
526RAYGUIAPI float GuiProgressBar(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue); // Progress Bar control, shows current progress value
527RAYGUIAPI void GuiStatusBar(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Status Bar control, shows info text
528RAYGUIAPI void GuiDummyRec(Rectangle bounds, const char *text); // Dummy control for placeholders
529RAYGUIAPI Vector2 GuiGrid(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, float spacing, int subdivs); // Grid control, returns mouse cell position
530

533RAYGUIAPI int GuiListViewEx(Rectangle bounds, const char **text, int count, int *focus, int *scrollIndex, int active); // List View with extended parameters
534RAYGUIAPI int GuiMessageBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *title, const char *message, const char *buttons); // Message Box control, displays a message
535RAYGUIAPI int GuiTextInputBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *title, const char *message, const char *buttons, char *text, int textMaxSize, int *secretViewActive); // Text Input Box control, ask for text, supports secret
536RAYGUIAPI Color GuiColorPicker(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, Color color); // Color Picker control (multiple color controls)
537RAYGUIAPI Color GuiColorPanel(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, Color color); // Color Panel control

851
852#if !defined(RAYGUI_NO_ICONS) && !defined(RAYGUI_CUSTOM_ICONS)
853
854// Embedded icons, no external file provided
855#define RAYGUI_ICON_SIZE 16 // Size of icons in pixels (squared)
856#define RAYGUI_ICON_MAX_ICONS 256 // Maximum number of icons
857#define RAYGUI_ICON_MAX_NAME_LENGTH 32 // Maximum length of icon name id
858
859// Icons data is defined by bit array (every bit represents one pixel)
860// Those arrays are stored as unsigned int data arrays, so,
861// every array element defines 32 pixels (bits) of information
862// One icon is defined by 8 int, (8 int * 32 bit = 256 bit = 16*16 pixels)
863// NOTE: Number of elemens depend on RAYGUI_ICON_SIZE (by default 16x16 pixels)
864#define RAYGUI_ICON_DATA_ELEMENTS (RAYGUI_ICON_SIZE*RAYGUI_ICON_SIZE/32)
865
866//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
867// Icons data for all gui possible icons (allocated on data segment by default)
868//
869// NOTE 1: Every icon is codified in binary form, using 1 bit per pixel, so,
870// every 16x16 icon requires 8 integers (16*16/32) to be stored
871//
872// NOTE 2: A different icon set could be loaded over this array using GuiLoadIcons(),
873// but loaded icons set must be same RAYGUI_ICON_SIZE and no more than RAYGUI_ICON_MAX_ICONS
874//
875// guiIcons size is by default: 256*(16*16/32) = 2048*4 = 8192 bytes = 8 KB
876//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
877static unsigned int guiIcons[RAYGUI_ICON_MAX_ICONS*RAYGUI_ICON_DATA_ELEMENTS] = {

1142#define RAYGUI_MAX_CONTROLS 16 // Maximum number of standard controls
1143#define RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE 16 // Maximum number of standard properties
1144#define RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED 8 // Maximum number of extended properties
1145
1146//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1147// Types and Structures Definition
1148//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1149// Gui control property style color element
1150typedef enum { BORDER = 0, BASE, TEXT, OTHER } GuiPropertyElement;
1151
1152//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1153// Global Variables Definition
1154//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1155static GuiState guiState = STATE_NORMAL; // Gui global state, if !STATE_NORMAL, forces defined state
1156
1157static Font guiFont = { 0 }; // Gui current font (WARNING: highly coupled to raylib)
1158static bool guiLocked = false; // Gui lock state (no inputs processed)
1159static float guiAlpha = 1.0f; // Gui element transpacency on drawing
1160
1161static unsigned int guiIconScale = 1; // Gui icon default scale (if icons enabled)
1162
1163//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1164// Style data array for all gui style properties (allocated on data segment by default)
1165//
1166// NOTE 1: First set of BASE properties are generic to all controls but could be individually
1167// overwritten per control, first set of EXTENDED properties are generic to all controls and
1168// can not be overwritten individually but custom EXTENDED properties can be used by control
1169//
1170// NOTE 2: A new style set could be loaded over this array using GuiLoadStyle(),
1171// but default gui style could always be recovered with GuiLoadStyleDefault()
1172//
1173// guiStyle size is by default: 16*(16 + 8) = 384*4 = 1536 bytes = 1.5 KB
1174//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1175static unsigned int guiStyle[RAYGUI_MAX_CONTROLS*(RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE + RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED)] = { 0 };
1176
1177static bool guiStyleLoaded = false; // Style loaded flag for lazy style initialization
1178

1262//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1263// Gui Setup Functions Definition
1264//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1265// Enable gui global state
1266// NOTE: We check for STATE_DISABLED to avoid messing custom global state setups
1267void GuiEnable(void) { if (guiState == STATE_DISABLED) guiState = STATE_NORMAL; }
1268
1269// Disable gui global state
1270// NOTE: We check for STATE_NORMAL to avoid messing custom global state setups
1271void GuiDisable(void) { if (guiState == STATE_NORMAL) guiState = STATE_DISABLED; }
1272
1273// Lock gui global state
1274void GuiLock(void) { guiLocked = true; }
1275
1276// Unlock gui global state
1277void GuiUnlock(void) { guiLocked = false; }
1278
1279// Check if gui is locked (global state)
1280bool GuiIsLocked(void) { return guiLocked; }
1281
1282// Set gui controls alpha global state
1283void GuiFade(float alpha)
1284{
1285 if (alpha < 0.0f) alpha = 0.0f;
1286 else if (alpha > 1.0f) alpha = 1.0f;
1287
1288 guiAlpha = alpha;
1289}
1290
1291// Set gui state (global state)
1292void GuiSetState(int state) { guiState = (GuiState)state; }
1293
1294// Get gui state (global state)
1295int GuiGetState(void) { return guiState; }
1296
1297// Set custom gui font
1298// NOTE: Font loading/unloading is external to raygui
1299void GuiSetFont(Font font)
1300{
1301 if (font.texture.id > 0)
1302 {
1303 // NOTE: If we try to setup a font but default style has not been
1304 // lazily loaded before, it will be overwritten, so we need to force
1305 // default style loading first
1306 if (!guiStyleLoaded) GuiLoadStyleDefault();
1307
1308 guiFont = font;
1309 GuiSetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE, font.baseSize);
1310 }
1311}
1312
1313// Get custom gui font
1314Font GuiGetFont(void)
1315{
1316 return guiFont;
1317}
1318
1319// Set control style property value
1320void GuiSetStyle(int control, int property, int value)
1321{
1322 if (!guiStyleLoaded) GuiLoadStyleDefault();
1323 guiStyle[control*(RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE + RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED) + property] = value;
1324
1325 // Default properties are propagated to all controls
1326 if ((control == 0) && (property < RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE))
1327 {
1328 for (int i = 1; i < RAYGUI_MAX_CONTROLS; i++) guiStyle[i*(RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE + RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED) + property] = value;
1329 }
1330}
1331
1332// Get control style property value
1333int GuiGetStyle(int control, int property)
1334{
1335 if (!guiStyleLoaded) GuiLoadStyleDefault();
1336 return guiStyle[control*(RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_BASE + RAYGUI_MAX_PROPS_EXTENDED) + property];
1337}

1339//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1340// Gui Controls Functions Definition
1341//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1342
1343// Window Box control
1344bool GuiWindowBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *title)
1345{
1346 // Window title bar height (including borders)
1347 // NOTE: This define is also used by GuiMessageBox() and GuiTextInputBox()
1348 #if !defined(RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT)
1349 #define RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT 24
1350 #endif
1351
1352 //GuiState state = guiState;
1353 bool clicked = false;
1354
1355 int statusBarHeight = RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT;
1356
1357 Rectangle statusBar = { bounds.x, bounds.y, bounds.width, (float)statusBarHeight };
1358 if (bounds.height < statusBarHeight*2.0f) bounds.height = statusBarHeight*2.0f;
1359
1360 Rectangle windowPanel = { bounds.x, bounds.y + (float)statusBarHeight - 1, bounds.width, bounds.height - (float)statusBarHeight + 1 };
1361 Rectangle closeButtonRec = { statusBar.x + statusBar.width - GuiGetStyle(STATUSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH) - 20,
1362 statusBar.y + statusBarHeight/2.0f - 18.0f/2.0f, 18, 18 };
1363
1364 // Update control
1365 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1366 // NOTE: Logic is directly managed by button
1367 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1368
1369 // Draw control
1370 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1371 GuiStatusBar(statusBar, title); // Draw window header as status bar
1372 GuiPanel(windowPanel, NULL); // Draw window base
1373
1374 // Draw window close button
1375 int tempBorderWidth = GuiGetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH);
1376 int tempTextAlignment = GuiGetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT);
1377 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH, 1);
1378 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT, TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER);
1379#if defined(RAYGUI_NO_ICONS)
1380 clicked = GuiButton(closeButtonRec, "x");
1381#else
1382 clicked = GuiButton(closeButtonRec, GuiIconText(ICON_CROSS_SMALL, NULL));
1383#endif
1384 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH, tempBorderWidth);
1385 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT, tempTextAlignment);
1386 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1387
1388 return clicked;
1389}
1390
1391// Group Box control with text name
1392void GuiGroupBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text)
1393{
1394 #if !defined(RAYGUI_GROUPBOX_LINE_THICK)
1395 #define RAYGUI_GROUPBOX_LINE_THICK 1
1396 #endif
1397
1398 GuiState state = guiState;
1399
1400 // Draw control
1401 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1402 GuiDrawRectangle(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x, bounds.y, RAYGUI_GROUPBOX_LINE_THICK, bounds.height }, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, (state == STATE_DISABLED)? BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED : LINE_COLOR)), guiAlpha));
1403 GuiDrawRectangle(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x, bounds.y + bounds.height - 1, bounds.width, RAYGUI_GROUPBOX_LINE_THICK }, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, (state == STATE_DISABLED)? BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED : LINE_COLOR)), guiAlpha));
1404 GuiDrawRectangle(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x + bounds.width - 1, bounds.y, RAYGUI_GROUPBOX_LINE_THICK, bounds.height }, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, (state == STATE_DISABLED)? BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED : LINE_COLOR)), guiAlpha));
1405
1406 GuiLine(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x, bounds.y - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2, bounds.width, (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE) }, text);
1407 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1408}
1409
1410// Line control
1411void GuiLine(Rectangle bounds, const char *text)
1412{
1413 #if !defined(RAYGUI_LINE_ORIGIN_SIZE)
1414 #define RAYGUI_LINE_MARGIN_TEXT 12
1415 #endif
1416 #if !defined(RAYGUI_LINE_TEXT_PADDING)
1417 #define RAYGUI_LINE_TEXT_PADDING 4
1418 #endif
1419
1420 GuiState state = guiState;
1421
1422 Color color = Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, (state == STATE_DISABLED)? BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED : LINE_COLOR)), guiAlpha);
1423
1424 // Draw control
1425 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1426 if (text == NULL) GuiDrawRectangle(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x, bounds.y + bounds.height/2, bounds.width, 1 }, 0, BLANK, color);
1427 else
1428 {
1429 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
1430 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(text);
1431 textBounds.height = bounds.height;
1432 textBounds.x = bounds.x + RAYGUI_LINE_MARGIN_TEXT;
1433 textBounds.y = bounds.y;
1434
1435 // Draw line with embedded text label: "--- text --------------"
1436 GuiDrawRectangle(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x, bounds.y + bounds.height/2, RAYGUI_LINE_MARGIN_TEXT - RAYGUI_LINE_TEXT_PADDING, 1 }, 0, BLANK, color);
1437 GuiDrawText(text, textBounds, TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT, color);
1438 GuiDrawRectangle(RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x + 12 + textBounds.width + 4, bounds.y + bounds.height/2, bounds.width - textBounds.width - RAYGUI_LINE_MARGIN_TEXT - RAYGUI_LINE_TEXT_PADDING, 1 }, 0, BLANK, color);
1439 }
1440 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1441}
1442
1443// Panel control
1444void GuiPanel(Rectangle bounds, const char *text)
1445{
1446 #if !defined(RAYGUI_PANEL_BORDER_WIDTH)
1447 #define RAYGUI_PANEL_BORDER_WIDTH 1
1448 #endif
1449
1450 GuiState state = guiState;
1451
1452 // Text will be drawn as a header bar (if provided)
1453 Rectangle statusBar = { bounds.x, bounds.y, bounds.width, (float)RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT };
1454 if ((text != NULL) && (bounds.height < RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT*2.0f)) bounds.height = RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT*2.0f;
1455
1456 if (text != NULL)
1457 {
1458 // Move panel bounds after the header bar
1459 bounds.y += (float)RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT - 1;
1460 bounds.height -= (float)RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT + 1;
1461 }
1462
1463 // Draw control
1464 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1465 if (text != NULL) GuiStatusBar(statusBar, text); // Draw panel header as status bar
1466
1467 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, RAYGUI_PANEL_BORDER_WIDTH, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, (state == STATE_DISABLED)? BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED: LINE_COLOR)), guiAlpha),
1468 Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, (state == STATE_DISABLED)? BASE_COLOR_DISABLED : BACKGROUND_COLOR)), guiAlpha));
1469 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1470}
1471
1472// Scroll Panel control
1473Rectangle GuiScrollPanel(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, Rectangle content, Vector2 *scroll)
1474{
1475 GuiState state = guiState;
1476
1477 Vector2 scrollPos = { 0.0f, 0.0f };
1478 if (scroll != NULL) scrollPos = *scroll;
1479
1480 // Text will be drawn as a header bar (if provided)
1481 Rectangle statusBar = { bounds.x, bounds.y, bounds.width, (float)RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT };
1482 if (bounds.height < RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT*2.0f) bounds.height = RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT*2.0f;
1483
1484 if (text != NULL)
1485 {
1486 // Move panel bounds after the header bar
1487 bounds.y += (float)RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT - 1;
1488 bounds.height -= (float)RAYGUI_WINDOWBOX_STATUSBAR_HEIGHT + 1;
1489 }
1490
1491 bool hasHorizontalScrollBar = (content.width > bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH))? true : false;
1492 bool hasVerticalScrollBar = (content.height > bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH))? true : false;
1493
1494 // Recheck to account for the other scrollbar being visible
1495 if (!hasHorizontalScrollBar) hasHorizontalScrollBar = (hasVerticalScrollBar && (content.width > (bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_WIDTH))))? true : false;
1496 if (!hasVerticalScrollBar) hasVerticalScrollBar = (hasHorizontalScrollBar && (content.height > (bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_WIDTH))))? true : false;
1497
1498 int horizontalScrollBarWidth = hasHorizontalScrollBar? GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_WIDTH) : 0;
1499 int verticalScrollBarWidth = hasVerticalScrollBar? GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_WIDTH) : 0;
1500 Rectangle horizontalScrollBar = { (float)((GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)? (float)bounds.x + verticalScrollBarWidth : (float)bounds.x) + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), (float)bounds.y + bounds.height - horizontalScrollBarWidth - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), (float)bounds.width - verticalScrollBarWidth - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), (float)horizontalScrollBarWidth };
1501 Rectangle verticalScrollBar = { (float)((GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)? (float)bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) : (float)bounds.x + bounds.width - verticalScrollBarWidth - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH)), (float)bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), (float)verticalScrollBarWidth, (float)bounds.height - horizontalScrollBarWidth - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) };
1502
1503 // Calculate view area (area without the scrollbars)
1504 Rectangle view = (GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)?
1505 RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x + verticalScrollBarWidth + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - verticalScrollBarWidth, bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - horizontalScrollBarWidth } :
1506 RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - verticalScrollBarWidth, bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - horizontalScrollBarWidth };
1507
1508 // Clip view area to the actual content size
1509 if (view.width > content.width) view.width = content.width;
1510 if (view.height > content.height) view.height = content.height;
1511
1512 float horizontalMin = hasHorizontalScrollBar? ((GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)? (float)-verticalScrollBarWidth : 0) - (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) : (((float)GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)? (float)-verticalScrollBarWidth : 0) - (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH);
1513 float horizontalMax = hasHorizontalScrollBar? content.width - bounds.width + (float)verticalScrollBarWidth + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - (((float)GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)? (float)verticalScrollBarWidth : 0) : (float)-GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH);
1514 float verticalMin = hasVerticalScrollBar? 0 : -1;
1515 float verticalMax = hasVerticalScrollBar? content.height - bounds.height + (float)horizontalScrollBarWidth + (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) : (float)-GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH);
1516
1517 // Update control
1518 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1519 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
1520 {
1521 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
1522
1523 // Check button state
1524 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
1525 {
1526 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) state = STATE_PRESSED;
1527 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
1528
1529#if defined(SUPPORT_SCROLLBAR_KEY_INPUT)
1530 if (hasHorizontalScrollBar)
1531 {
1532 if (IsKeyDown(KEY_RIGHT)) scrollPos.x -= GuiGetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SPEED);
1533 if (IsKeyDown(KEY_LEFT)) scrollPos.x += GuiGetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SPEED);
1534 }
1535
1536 if (hasVerticalScrollBar)
1537 {
1538 if (IsKeyDown(KEY_DOWN)) scrollPos.y -= GuiGetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SPEED);
1539 if (IsKeyDown(KEY_UP)) scrollPos.y += GuiGetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SPEED);
1540 }
1541#endif
1542 float wheelMove = GetMouseWheelMove();
1543
1544 // Horizontal scroll (Shift + Mouse wheel)
1545 if (hasHorizontalScrollBar && (IsKeyDown(KEY_LEFT_CONTROL) || IsKeyDown(KEY_RIGHT_SHIFT))) scrollPos.x += wheelMove*20;
1546 else scrollPos.y += wheelMove*20; // Vertical scroll
1547 }
1548 }
1549
1550 // Normalize scroll values
1551 if (scrollPos.x > -horizontalMin) scrollPos.x = -horizontalMin;
1552 if (scrollPos.x < -horizontalMax) scrollPos.x = -horizontalMax;
1553 if (scrollPos.y > -verticalMin) scrollPos.y = -verticalMin;
1554 if (scrollPos.y < -verticalMax) scrollPos.y = -verticalMax;
1555 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1556
1557 // Draw control
1558 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1559 if (text != NULL) GuiStatusBar(statusBar, text); // Draw panel header as status bar
1560
1561 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, 0, BLANK, GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BACKGROUND_COLOR))); // Draw background
1562
1563 // Save size of the scrollbar slider
1564 const int slider = GuiGetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SLIDER_SIZE);
1565
1566 // Draw horizontal scrollbar if visible
1567 if (hasHorizontalScrollBar)
1568 {
1569 // Change scrollbar slider size to show the diff in size between the content width and the widget width
1570 GuiSetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SLIDER_SIZE, (int)(((bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - verticalScrollBarWidth)/(int)content.width)*((int)bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - verticalScrollBarWidth)));
1571 scrollPos.x = (float)-GuiScrollBar(horizontalScrollBar, (int)-scrollPos.x, (int)horizontalMin, (int)horizontalMax);
1572 }
1573 else scrollPos.x = 0.0f;
1574
1575 // Draw vertical scrollbar if visible
1576 if (hasVerticalScrollBar)
1577 {
1578 // Change scrollbar slider size to show the diff in size between the content height and the widget height
1579 GuiSetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SLIDER_SIZE, (int)(((bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - horizontalScrollBarWidth)/(int)content.height)*((int)bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) - horizontalScrollBarWidth)));
1580 scrollPos.y = (float)-GuiScrollBar(verticalScrollBar, (int)-scrollPos.y, (int)verticalMin, (int)verticalMax);
1581 }
1582 else scrollPos.y = 0.0f;
1583
1584 // Draw detail corner rectangle if both scroll bars are visible
1585 if (hasHorizontalScrollBar && hasVerticalScrollBar)
1586 {
1587 Rectangle corner = { (GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, SCROLLBAR_SIDE) == SCROLLBAR_LEFT_SIDE)? (bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH) + 2) : (horizontalScrollBar.x + horizontalScrollBar.width + 2), verticalScrollBar.y + verticalScrollBar.height + 2, (float)horizontalScrollBarWidth - 4, (float)verticalScrollBarWidth - 4 };
1588 GuiDrawRectangle(corner, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
1589 }
1590
1591 // Draw scrollbar lines depending on current state
1592 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(LISTVIEW, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), BLANK);
1593
1594 // Set scrollbar slider size back to the way it was before
1595 GuiSetStyle(SCROLLBAR, SCROLL_SLIDER_SIZE, slider);
1596 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1597
1598 if (scroll != NULL) *scroll = scrollPos;
1599
1600 return view;
1601}

1686// Toggle Button control, returns true when active
1687bool GuiToggle(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, bool active)
1688{
1689 GuiState state = guiState;
1690
1691 // Update control
1692 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1693 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
1694 {
1695 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
1696
1697 // Check toggle button state
1698 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
1699 {
1700 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) state = STATE_PRESSED;
1701 else if (IsMouseButtonReleased(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))
1702 {
1703 state = STATE_NORMAL;
1704 active = !active;
1705 }
1706 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
1707 }
1708 }
1709 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1710
1711 // Draw control
1712 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1713 if (state == STATE_NORMAL)
1714 {
1715 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, (active? BORDER_COLOR_PRESSED : (BORDER + state*3)))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, (active? BASE_COLOR_PRESSED : (BASE + state*3)))), guiAlpha));
1716 GuiDrawText(text, GetTextBounds(TOGGLE, bounds), GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, (active? TEXT_COLOR_PRESSED : (TEXT + state*3)))), guiAlpha));
1717 }
1718 else
1719 {
1720 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, BORDER + state*3)), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, BASE + state*3)), guiAlpha));
1721 GuiDrawText(text, GetTextBounds(TOGGLE, bounds), GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, TEXT + state*3)), guiAlpha));
1722 }
1723 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1724
1725 return active;
1726}
1727
1728// Toggle Group control, returns toggled button index
1729int GuiToggleGroup(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int active)
1730{
1731 #if !defined(RAYGUI_TOGGLEGROUP_MAX_ITEMS)
1732 #define RAYGUI_TOGGLEGROUP_MAX_ITEMS 32
1733 #endif
1734
1735 float initBoundsX = bounds.x;
1736
1737 // Get substrings items from text (items pointers)
1738 int rows[RAYGUI_TOGGLEGROUP_MAX_ITEMS] = { 0 };
1739 int itemCount = 0;
1740 const char **items = GuiTextSplit(text, &itemCount, rows);
1741
1742 int prevRow = rows[0];
1743
1744 for (int i = 0; i < itemCount; i++)
1745 {
1746 if (prevRow != rows[i])
1747 {
1748 bounds.x = initBoundsX;
1749 bounds.y += (bounds.height + GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, GROUP_PADDING));
1750 prevRow = rows[i];
1751 }
1752
1753 if (i == active) GuiToggle(bounds, items[i], true);
1754 else if (GuiToggle(bounds, items[i], false) == true) active = i;
1755
1756 bounds.x += (bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(TOGGLE, GROUP_PADDING));
1757 }
1758
1759 return active;
1760}
1761
1762// Check Box control, returns true when active
1763bool GuiCheckBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, bool checked)
1764{
1765 GuiState state = guiState;
1766
1767 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
1768
1769 if (text != NULL)
1770 {
1771 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(text);
1772 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
1773 textBounds.x = bounds.x + bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT_PADDING);
1774 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
1775 if (GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT) textBounds.x = bounds.x - textBounds.width - GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT_PADDING);
1776 }
1777
1778 // Update control
1779 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1780 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
1781 {
1782 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
1783
1784 Rectangle totalBounds = {
1785 (GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT)? textBounds.x : bounds.x,
1786 bounds.y,
1787 bounds.width + textBounds.width + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT_PADDING),
1788 bounds.height,
1789 };
1790
1791 // Check checkbox state
1792 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, totalBounds))
1793 {
1794 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) state = STATE_PRESSED;
1795 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
1796
1797 if (IsMouseButtonReleased(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) checked = !checked;
1798 }
1799 }
1800 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1801
1802 // Draw control
1803 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1804 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), BLANK);
1805
1806 if (checked)
1807 {
1808 Rectangle check = { bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, CHECK_PADDING),
1809 bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, CHECK_PADDING),
1810 bounds.width - 2*(GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, CHECK_PADDING)),
1811 bounds.height - 2*(GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, CHECK_PADDING)) };
1812 GuiDrawRectangle(check, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT + state*3)), guiAlpha));
1813 }
1814
1815 GuiDrawText(text, textBounds, (GuiGetStyle(CHECKBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT)? TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT : TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(LABEL, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
1816 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1817
1818 return checked;
1819}
1820
1821// Combo Box control, returns selected item index
1822int GuiComboBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int active)
1823{
1824 GuiState state = guiState;
1825
1826 bounds.width -= (GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, COMBO_BUTTON_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, COMBO_BUTTON_SPACING));
1827
1828 Rectangle selector = { (float)bounds.x + bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, COMBO_BUTTON_SPACING),
1829 (float)bounds.y, (float)GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, COMBO_BUTTON_WIDTH), (float)bounds.height };
1830
1831 // Get substrings items from text (items pointers, lengths and count)
1832 int itemCount = 0;
1833 const char **items = GuiTextSplit(text, &itemCount, NULL);
1834
1835 if (active < 0) active = 0;
1836 else if (active > itemCount - 1) active = itemCount - 1;
1837
1838 // Update control
1839 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1840 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked && (itemCount > 1))
1841 {
1842 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
1843
1844 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds) ||
1845 CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, selector))
1846 {
1847 if (IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))
1848 {
1849 active += 1;
1850 if (active >= itemCount) active = 0;
1851 }
1852
1853 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) state = STATE_PRESSED;
1854 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
1855 }
1856 }
1857 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1858
1859 // Draw control
1860 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1861 // Draw combo box main
1862 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, BASE + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
1863 GuiDrawText(items[active], GetTextBounds(COMBOBOX, bounds), GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(COMBOBOX, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
1864
1865 // Draw selector using a custom button
1866 // NOTE: BORDER_WIDTH and TEXT_ALIGNMENT forced values
1867 int tempBorderWidth = GuiGetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH);
1868 int tempTextAlign = GuiGetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT);
1869 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH, 1);
1870 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT, TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER);
1871
1872 GuiButton(selector, TextFormat("%i/%i", active + 1, itemCount));
1873
1874 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT, tempTextAlign);
1875 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH, tempBorderWidth);
1876 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1877
1878 return active;
1879}
1880
1881// Dropdown Box control
1882// NOTE: Returns mouse click
1883bool GuiDropdownBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int *active, bool editMode)
1884{
1885 GuiState state = guiState;
1886 int itemSelected = *active;
1887 int itemFocused = -1;
1888
1889 // Get substrings items from text (items pointers, lengths and count)
1890 int itemCount = 0;
1891 const char **items = GuiTextSplit(text, &itemCount, NULL);
1892
1893 Rectangle boundsOpen = bounds;
1894 boundsOpen.height = (itemCount + 1)*(bounds.height + GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, DROPDOWN_ITEMS_SPACING));
1895
1896 Rectangle itemBounds = bounds;
1897
1898 bool pressed = false; // Check mouse button pressed
1899
1900 // Update control
1901 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1902 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && (editMode || !guiLocked) && (itemCount > 1))
1903 {
1904 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
1905
1906 if (editMode)
1907 {
1908 state = STATE_PRESSED;
1909
1910 // Check if mouse has been pressed or released outside limits
1911 if (!CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, boundsOpen))
1912 {
1913 if (IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) || IsMouseButtonReleased(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) pressed = true;
1914 }
1915
1916 // Check if already selected item has been pressed again
1917 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds) && IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) pressed = true;
1918
1919 // Check focused and selected item
1920 for (int i = 0; i < itemCount; i++)
1921 {
1922 // Update item rectangle y position for next item
1923 itemBounds.y += (bounds.height + GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, DROPDOWN_ITEMS_SPACING));
1924
1925 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, itemBounds))
1926 {
1927 itemFocused = i;
1928 if (IsMouseButtonReleased(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))
1929 {
1930 itemSelected = i;
1931 pressed = true; // Item selected, change to editMode = false
1932 }
1933 break;
1934 }
1935 }
1936
1937 itemBounds = bounds;
1938 }
1939 else
1940 {
1941 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
1942 {
1943 if (IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))
1944 {
1945 pressed = true;
1946 state = STATE_PRESSED;
1947 }
1948 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
1949 }
1950 }
1951 }
1952 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1953
1954 // Draw control
1955 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1956 if (editMode) GuiPanel(boundsOpen, NULL);
1957
1958 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BORDER + state*3)), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BASE + state*3)), guiAlpha));
1959 GuiDrawText(items[itemSelected], GetTextBounds(DEFAULT, bounds), GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT + state*3)), guiAlpha));
1960
1961 if (editMode)
1962 {
1963 // Draw visible items
1964 for (int i = 0; i < itemCount; i++)
1965 {
1966 // Update item rectangle y position for next item
1967 itemBounds.y += (bounds.height + GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, DROPDOWN_ITEMS_SPACING));
1968
1969 if (i == itemSelected)
1970 {
1971 GuiDrawRectangle(itemBounds, GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BORDER_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BASE_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
1972 GuiDrawText(items[i], GetTextBounds(DEFAULT, itemBounds), GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
1973 }
1974 else if (i == itemFocused)
1975 {
1976 GuiDrawRectangle(itemBounds, GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BORDER_COLOR_FOCUSED)), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, BASE_COLOR_FOCUSED)), guiAlpha));
1977 GuiDrawText(items[i], GetTextBounds(DEFAULT, itemBounds), GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_COLOR_FOCUSED)), guiAlpha));
1978 }
1979 else GuiDrawText(items[i], GetTextBounds(DEFAULT, itemBounds), GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT_COLOR_NORMAL)), guiAlpha));
1980 }
1981 }
1982
1983 // Draw arrows (using icon if available)
1984#if defined(RAYGUI_NO_ICONS)
1985 GuiDrawText("v", RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x + bounds.width - GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, ARROW_PADDING), bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - 2, 10, 10 },
1986 TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
1987#else
1988 GuiDrawText("#120#", RAYGUI_CLITERAL(Rectangle){ bounds.x + bounds.width - GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, ARROW_PADDING), bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - 6, 10, 10 },
1989 TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(DROPDOWNBOX, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha)); // ICON_ARROW_DOWN_FILL
1990#endif
1991 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
1992
1993 *active = itemSelected;
1994 return pressed;
1995}
1996
1997// Text Box control, updates input text
1998// NOTE 2: Returns if KEY_ENTER pressed (useful for data validation)
1999bool GuiTextBox(Rectangle bounds, char *text, int textSize, bool editMode)
2000{
2001 GuiState state = guiState;
2002 bool pressed = false;
2003 int textWidth = GetTextWidth(text);
2004 Rectangle textBounds = GetTextBounds(TEXTBOX, bounds);
2005 int textAlignment = editMode && textWidth >= textBounds.width ? TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT : GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT);
2006
2007 Rectangle cursor = {
2008 bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_PADDING) + GetTextWidth(text) + 2,
2009 bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE),
2010 4,
2011 (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)*2
2012 };
2013
2014 if (cursor.height >= bounds.height) cursor.height = bounds.height - GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH)*2;
2015 if (cursor.y < (bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH))) cursor.y = bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH);
2016
2017 // Update control
2018 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2019 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
2020 {
2021 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
2022
2023 if (editMode)
2024 {
2025 state = STATE_PRESSED;
2026
2027 int key = GetCharPressed(); // Returns codepoint as Unicode
2028 int keyCount = (int)strlen(text);
2029 int byteSize = 0;
2030 const char *textUTF8 = CodepointToUTF8(key, &byteSize);
2031
2032 // Only allow keys in range [32..125]
2033 if ((keyCount + byteSize) < textSize)
2034 {
2035 float maxWidth = (bounds.width - (GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_INNER_PADDING)*2));
2036
2037 if (key >= 32)
2038 {
2039 for (int i = 0; i < byteSize; i++)
2040 {
2041 text[keyCount] = textUTF8[i];
2042 keyCount++;
2043 }
2044
2045 text[keyCount] = '\0';
2046 }
2047 }
2048
2049 // Delete text
2050 if (keyCount > 0)
2051 {
2052 if (IsKeyPressed(KEY_BACKSPACE))
2053 {
2054 while ((keyCount > 0) && ((text[--keyCount] & 0xc0) == 0x80));
2055 text[keyCount] = '\0';
2056 }
2057 }
2058
2059 if (IsKeyPressed(KEY_ENTER) || (!CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds) && IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))) pressed = true;
2060
2061 // Check text alignment to position cursor properly
2062 if (textAlignment == TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER) cursor.x = bounds.x + GetTextWidth(text)/2 + bounds.width/2 + 1;
2063 else if (textAlignment == TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT) cursor.x = bounds.x + bounds.width - GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_INNER_PADDING) - GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH);
2064 }
2065 else
2066 {
2067 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
2068 {
2069 state = STATE_FOCUSED;
2070 if (IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) pressed = true;
2071 }
2072 }
2073 }
2074 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2075
2076 // Draw control
2077 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2078 if (state == STATE_PRESSED)
2079 {
2080 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BASE_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2081 }
2082 else if (state == STATE_DISABLED)
2083 {
2084 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BASE_COLOR_DISABLED)), guiAlpha));
2085 }
2086 else GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, 1, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), BLANK);
2087
2088 // in case we edit and text does not fit in the textbox show right aligned and character clipped, slower but working
2089 while (editMode && textWidth >= textBounds.width && *text)
2090 {
2091 int bytes = 0;
2092 GetCodepoint(text, &bytes);
2093 text += bytes;
2094 textWidth = GetTextWidth(text);
2095 }
2096 GuiDrawText(text, textBounds, textAlignment, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2097
2098 // Draw cursor
2099 if (editMode) GuiDrawRectangle(cursor, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2100 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2101
2102 return pressed;
2103}

2105// Spinner control, returns selected value
2106bool GuiSpinner(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int *value, int minValue, int maxValue, bool editMode)
2107{
2108 GuiState state = guiState;
2109
2110 bool pressed = false;
2111 int tempValue = *value;
2112
2113 Rectangle spinner = { bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_SPACING), bounds.y,
2114 bounds.width - 2*(GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_SPACING)), bounds.height };
2115 Rectangle leftButtonBound = { (float)bounds.x, (float)bounds.y, (float)GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_WIDTH), (float)bounds.height };
2116 Rectangle rightButtonBound = { (float)bounds.x + bounds.width - GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_WIDTH), (float)bounds.y, (float)GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, SPIN_BUTTON_WIDTH), (float)bounds.height };
2117
2118 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
2119 if (text != NULL)
2120 {
2121 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(text);
2122 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
2123 textBounds.x = bounds.x + bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, TEXT_PADDING);
2124 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
2125 if (GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT) textBounds.x = bounds.x - textBounds.width - GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, TEXT_PADDING);
2126 }
2127
2128 // Update control
2129 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2130 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
2131 {
2132 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
2133
2134 // Check spinner state
2135 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
2136 {
2137 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) state = STATE_PRESSED;
2138 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
2139 }
2140 }
2141
2142#if defined(RAYGUI_NO_ICONS)
2143 if (GuiButton(leftButtonBound, "<")) tempValue--;
2144 if (GuiButton(rightButtonBound, ">")) tempValue++;
2145#else
2146 if (GuiButton(leftButtonBound, GuiIconText(ICON_ARROW_LEFT_FILL, NULL))) tempValue--;
2147 if (GuiButton(rightButtonBound, GuiIconText(ICON_ARROW_RIGHT_FILL, NULL))) tempValue++;
2148#endif
2149
2150 if (!editMode)
2151 {
2152 if (tempValue < minValue) tempValue = minValue;
2153 if (tempValue > maxValue) tempValue = maxValue;
2154 }
2155 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2156
2157 // Draw control
2158 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2159 // TODO: Set Spinner properties for ValueBox
2160 pressed = GuiValueBox(spinner, NULL, &tempValue, minValue, maxValue, editMode);
2161
2162 // Draw value selector custom buttons
2163 // NOTE: BORDER_WIDTH and TEXT_ALIGNMENT forced values
2164 int tempBorderWidth = GuiGetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH);
2165 int tempTextAlign = GuiGetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT);
2166 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH, GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, BORDER_WIDTH));
2167 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT, TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER);
2168
2169 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, TEXT_ALIGNMENT, tempTextAlign);
2170 GuiSetStyle(BUTTON, BORDER_WIDTH, tempBorderWidth);
2171
2172 // Draw text label if provided
2173 GuiDrawText(text, textBounds, (GuiGetStyle(SPINNER, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT)? TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT : TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(LABEL, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2174 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2175
2176 *value = tempValue;
2177 return pressed;
2178}

2180// Value Box control, updates input text with numbers
2181// NOTE: Requires static variables: frameCounter
2182bool GuiValueBox(Rectangle bounds, const char *text, int *value, int minValue, int maxValue, bool editMode)
2183{
2184 #if !defined(RAYGUI_VALUEBOX_MAX_CHARS)
2185 #define RAYGUI_VALUEBOX_MAX_CHARS 32
2186 #endif
2187
2188 GuiState state = guiState;
2189 bool pressed = false;
2190
2191 char textValue[RAYGUI_VALUEBOX_MAX_CHARS + 1] = "\0";
2192 sprintf(textValue, "%i", *value);
2193
2194 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
2195 if (text != NULL)
2196 {
2197 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(text);
2198 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
2199 textBounds.x = bounds.x + bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, TEXT_PADDING);
2200 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
2201 if (GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT) textBounds.x = bounds.x - textBounds.width - GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, TEXT_PADDING);
2202 }
2203
2204 // Update control
2205 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2206 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
2207 {
2208 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
2209
2210 bool valueHasChanged = false;
2211
2212 if (editMode)
2213 {
2214 state = STATE_PRESSED;
2215
2216 int keyCount = (int)strlen(textValue);
2217
2218 // Only allow keys in range [48..57]
2219 if (keyCount < RAYGUI_VALUEBOX_MAX_CHARS)
2220 {
2221 if (GetTextWidth(textValue) < bounds.width)
2222 {
2223 int key = GetCharPressed();
2224 if ((key >= 48) && (key <= 57))
2225 {
2226 textValue[keyCount] = (char)key;
2227 keyCount++;
2228 valueHasChanged = true;
2229 }
2230 }
2231 }
2232
2233 // Delete text
2234 if (keyCount > 0)
2235 {
2236 if (IsKeyPressed(KEY_BACKSPACE))
2237 {
2238 keyCount--;
2239 textValue[keyCount] = '\0';
2240 valueHasChanged = true;
2241 }
2242 }
2243
2244 if (valueHasChanged) *value = TextToInteger(textValue);
2245
2246 // NOTE: We are not clamp values until user input finishes
2247 //if (*value > maxValue) *value = maxValue;
2248 //else if (*value < minValue) *value = minValue;
2249
2250 if (IsKeyPressed(KEY_ENTER) || (!CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds) && IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))) pressed = true;
2251 }
2252 else
2253 {
2254 if (*value > maxValue) *value = maxValue;
2255 else if (*value < minValue) *value = minValue;
2256
2257 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
2258 {
2259 state = STATE_FOCUSED;
2260 if (IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) pressed = true;
2261 }
2262 }
2263 }
2264 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2265
2266 // Draw control
2267 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2268 Color baseColor = BLANK;
2269 if (state == STATE_PRESSED) baseColor = GetColor(GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BASE_COLOR_PRESSED));
2270 else if (state == STATE_DISABLED) baseColor = GetColor(GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BASE_COLOR_DISABLED));
2271
2272 // WARNING: BLANK color does not work properly with Fade()
2273 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), baseColor);
2274 GuiDrawText(textValue, GetTextBounds(VALUEBOX, bounds), TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2275
2276 // Draw cursor
2277 if (editMode)
2278 {
2279 // NOTE: ValueBox internal text is always centered
2280 Rectangle cursor = { bounds.x + GetTextWidth(textValue)/2 + bounds.width/2 + 2, bounds.y + 2*GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), 4, bounds.height - 4*GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) };
2281 GuiDrawRectangle(cursor, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, BORDER_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2282 }
2283
2284 // Draw text label if provided
2285 GuiDrawText(text, textBounds, (GuiGetStyle(VALUEBOX, TEXT_ALIGNMENT) == TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT)? TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT : TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(LABEL, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2286 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2287
2288 return pressed;
2289}

2291// Text Box control with multiple lines
2292bool GuiTextBoxMulti(Rectangle bounds, char *text, int textSize, bool editMode)
2293{
2294 GuiState state = guiState;
2295 bool pressed = false;
2296
2297 Rectangle textAreaBounds = {
2298 bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_INNER_PADDING),
2299 bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_INNER_PADDING),
2300 bounds.width - 2*(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_INNER_PADDING)),
2301 bounds.height - 2*(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_INNER_PADDING))
2302 };
2303
2304 // Cursor position, [x, y] values should be updated
2305 Rectangle cursor = { 0, -1, 4, (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE) + 2 };
2306
2307 float scaleFactor = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/(float)guiFont.baseSize; // Character rectangle scaling factor
2308
2309 // Update control
2310 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2311 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
2312 {
2313 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
2314
2315 if (editMode)
2316 {
2317 state = STATE_PRESSED;
2318
2319 // We get an Unicode codepoint
2320 int codepoint = GetCharPressed();
2321 int textLength = (int)strlen(text); // Length in bytes (UTF-8 string)
2322 int byteSize = 0;
2323 const char *textUTF8 = CodepointToUTF8(codepoint, &byteSize);
2324
2325 // Introduce characters
2326 if ((textLength + byteSize) < textSize)
2327 {
2328 if (IsKeyPressed(KEY_ENTER))
2329 {
2330 text[textLength] = '\n';
2331 textLength++;
2332 }
2333 else if (codepoint >= 32)
2334 {
2335 // Supports Unicode inputs -> Encoded to UTF-8
2336 int charUTF8Length = 0;
2337 const char *charEncoded = CodepointToUTF8(codepoint, &charUTF8Length);
2338 memcpy(text + textLength, charEncoded, charUTF8Length);
2339 textLength += charUTF8Length;
2340 }
2341 }
2342
2343 // Delete characters
2344 if (textLength > 0)
2345 {
2346 if (IsKeyPressed(KEY_BACKSPACE))
2347 {
2348 if ((unsigned char)text[textLength - 1] < 127)
2349 {
2350 // Remove ASCII equivalent character (1 byte)
2351 textLength--;
2352 text[textLength] = '\0';
2353 }
2354 else
2355 {
2356 // Remove latest UTF-8 unicode character introduced (n bytes)
2357 int charUTF8Length = 0;
2358 while ((charUTF8Length < textLength) && ((unsigned char)text[textLength - 1 - charUTF8Length] & 0b01000000) == 0) charUTF8Length++;
2359
2360 textLength -= (charUTF8Length + 1);
2361 text[textLength] = '\0';
2362 }
2363 }
2364 }
2365
2366 // Exit edit mode
2367 if (!CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds) && IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) pressed = true;
2368 }
2369 else
2370 {
2371 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
2372 {
2373 state = STATE_FOCUSED;
2374 if (IsMouseButtonPressed(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) pressed = true;
2375 }
2376 }
2377 }
2378 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2379
2380 // Draw control
2381 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2382 if (state == STATE_PRESSED)
2383 {
2384 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BASE_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2385 }
2386 else if (state == STATE_DISABLED)
2387 {
2388 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BASE_COLOR_DISABLED)), guiAlpha));
2389 }
2390 else GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, 1, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), BLANK);
2391
2392 int wrapMode = 1; // 0-No wrap, 1-Char wrap, 2-Word wrap
2393 Vector2 cursorPos = { textAreaBounds.x, textAreaBounds.y };
2394
2395 //int lastSpacePos = 0;
2396 //int lastSpaceWidth = 0;
2397 //int lastSpaceCursorPos = 0;
2398
2399 for (int i = 0, codepointLength = 0; text[i] != '\0'; i += codepointLength)
2400 {
2401 int codepoint = GetCodepoint(text + i, &codepointLength);
2402 int index = GetGlyphIndex(guiFont, codepoint); // If requested codepoint is not found, we get '?' (0x3f)
2403 Rectangle atlasRec = guiFont.recs[index];
2404 GlyphInfo glyphInfo = guiFont.glyphs[index]; // Glyph measures
2405
2406 if ((codepointLength == 1) && (codepoint == '\n'))
2407 {
2408 cursorPos.y += (guiFont.baseSize*scaleFactor + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_LINES_SPACING)); // Line feed
2409 cursorPos.x = textAreaBounds.x; // Carriage return
2410 }
2411 else
2412 {
2413 if (wrapMode == 1)
2414 {
2415 int glyphWidth = 0;
2416 if (glyphInfo.advanceX != 0) glyphWidth += glyphInfo.advanceX;
2417 else glyphWidth += (int)(atlasRec.width + glyphInfo.offsetX);
2418
2419 // Jump line if the end of the text box area has been reached
2420 if ((cursorPos.x + (glyphWidth*scaleFactor)) > (textAreaBounds.x + textAreaBounds.width))
2421 {
2422 cursorPos.y += (guiFont.baseSize*scaleFactor + GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT_LINES_SPACING)); // Line feed
2423 cursorPos.x = textAreaBounds.x; // Carriage return
2424 }
2425 }
2426 else if (wrapMode == 2)
2427 {
2428 /*
2429 if ((codepointLength == 1) && (codepoint == ' '))
2430 {
2431 lastSpacePos = i;
2432 lastSpaceWidth = 0;
2433 lastSpaceCursorPos = cursorPos.x;
2434 }
2435
2436 // Jump line if last word reaches end of text box area
2437 if ((lastSpaceCursorPos + lastSpaceWidth) > (textAreaBounds.x + textAreaBounds.width))
2438 {
2439 cursorPos.y += 12; // Line feed
2440 cursorPos.x = textAreaBounds.x; // Carriage return
2441 }
2442 */
2443 }
2444
2445 // Draw current character glyph
2446 DrawTextCodepoint(guiFont, codepoint, cursorPos, (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2447
2448 int glyphWidth = 0;
2449 if (glyphInfo.advanceX != 0) glyphWidth += glyphInfo.advanceX;
2450 else glyphWidth += (int)(atlasRec.width + glyphInfo.offsetX);
2451
2452 cursorPos.x += (glyphWidth*scaleFactor + (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SPACING));
2453 //if (i > lastSpacePos) lastSpaceWidth += (atlasRec.width + (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SPACING));
2454 }
2455 }
2456
2457 cursor.x = cursorPos.x;
2458 cursor.y = cursorPos.y;
2459
2460 // Draw cursor position considering text glyphs
2461 if (editMode) GuiDrawRectangle(cursor, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(TEXTBOX, BORDER_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2462 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2463
2464 return pressed;
2465}
2466
2467// Slider control with pro parameters
2468// NOTE: Other GuiSlider*() controls use this one
2469float GuiSliderPro(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue, int sliderWidth)
2470{
2471 GuiState state = guiState;
2472
2473 int sliderValue = (int)(((value - minValue)/(maxValue - minValue))*(bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH)));
2474
2475 Rectangle slider = { bounds.x, bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, SLIDER_PADDING),
2476 0, bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH) - 2*GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, SLIDER_PADDING) };
2477
2478 if (sliderWidth > 0) // Slider
2479 {
2480 slider.x += (sliderValue - sliderWidth/2);
2481 slider.width = (float)sliderWidth;
2482 }
2483 else if (sliderWidth == 0) // SliderBar
2484 {
2485 slider.x += GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH);
2486 slider.width = (float)sliderValue;
2487 }
2488
2489 // Update control
2490 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2491 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
2492 {
2493 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
2494
2495 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
2496 {
2497 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON))
2498 {
2499 state = STATE_PRESSED;
2500
2501 // Get equivalent value and slider position from mousePoint.x
2502 value = ((maxValue - minValue)*(mousePoint.x - (float)(bounds.x + sliderWidth/2)))/(float)(bounds.width - sliderWidth) + minValue;
2503
2504 if (sliderWidth > 0) slider.x = mousePoint.x - slider.width/2; // Slider
2505 else if (sliderWidth == 0) slider.width = (float)sliderValue; // SliderBar
2506 }
2507 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
2508 }
2509
2510 if (value > maxValue) value = maxValue;
2511 else if (value < minValue) value = minValue;
2512 }
2513
2514 // Bar limits check
2515 if (sliderWidth > 0) // Slider
2516 {
2517 if (slider.x <= (bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH))) slider.x = bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH);
2518 else if ((slider.x + slider.width) >= (bounds.x + bounds.width)) slider.x = bounds.x + bounds.width - slider.width - GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH);
2519 }
2520 else if (sliderWidth == 0) // SliderBar
2521 {
2522 if (slider.width > bounds.width) slider.width = bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH);
2523 }
2524 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2525
2526 // Draw control
2527 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2528 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, (state != STATE_DISABLED)? BASE_COLOR_NORMAL : BASE_COLOR_DISABLED)), guiAlpha));
2529
2530 // Draw slider internal bar (depends on state)
2531 if ((state == STATE_NORMAL) || (state == STATE_PRESSED)) GuiDrawRectangle(slider, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, BASE_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2532 else if (state == STATE_FOCUSED) GuiDrawRectangle(slider, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, TEXT_COLOR_FOCUSED)), guiAlpha));
2533
2534 // Draw left/right text if provided
2535 if (textLeft != NULL)
2536 {
2537 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
2538 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(textLeft);
2539 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
2540 textBounds.x = bounds.x - textBounds.width - GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, TEXT_PADDING);
2541 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
2542
2543 GuiDrawText(textLeft, textBounds, TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2544 }
2545
2546 if (textRight != NULL)
2547 {
2548 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
2549 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(textRight);
2550 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
2551 textBounds.x = bounds.x + bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, TEXT_PADDING);
2552 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
2553
2554 GuiDrawText(textRight, textBounds, TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2555 }
2556 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2557
2558 return value;
2559}
2560
2561// Slider control extended, returns selected value and has text
2562float GuiSlider(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue)
2563{
2564 return GuiSliderPro(bounds, textLeft, textRight, value, minValue, maxValue, GuiGetStyle(SLIDER, SLIDER_WIDTH));
2565}
2566
2567// Slider Bar control extended, returns selected value
2568float GuiSliderBar(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue)
2569{
2570 return GuiSliderPro(bounds, textLeft, textRight, value, minValue, maxValue, 0);
2571}
2572
2573// Progress Bar control extended, shows current progress value
2574float GuiProgressBar(Rectangle bounds, const char *textLeft, const char *textRight, float value, float minValue, float maxValue)
2575{
2576 GuiState state = guiState;
2577
2578 Rectangle progress = { bounds.x + GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH),
2579 bounds.y + GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH) + GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, PROGRESS_PADDING), 0,
2580 bounds.height - 2*GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH) - 2*GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, PROGRESS_PADDING) };
2581
2582 // Update control
2583 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2584 if (value > maxValue) value = maxValue;
2585
2586 if (state != STATE_DISABLED) progress.width = ((float)(value/(maxValue - minValue))*(float)(bounds.width - 2*GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH)));
2587 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2588
2589 // Draw control
2590 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2591 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BORDER + (state*3))), guiAlpha), BLANK);
2592
2593 // Draw slider internal progress bar (depends on state)
2594 if ((state == STATE_NORMAL) || (state == STATE_PRESSED)) GuiDrawRectangle(progress, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, BASE_COLOR_PRESSED)), guiAlpha));
2595 else if (state == STATE_FOCUSED) GuiDrawRectangle(progress, 0, BLANK, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, TEXT_COLOR_FOCUSED)), guiAlpha));
2596
2597 // Draw left/right text if provided
2598 if (textLeft != NULL)
2599 {
2600 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
2601 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(textLeft);
2602 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
2603 textBounds.x = bounds.x - textBounds.width - GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, TEXT_PADDING);
2604 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
2605
2606 GuiDrawText(textLeft, textBounds, TEXT_ALIGN_RIGHT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2607 }
2608
2609 if (textRight != NULL)
2610 {
2611 Rectangle textBounds = { 0 };
2612 textBounds.width = (float)GetTextWidth(textRight);
2613 textBounds.height = (float)GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE);
2614 textBounds.x = bounds.x + bounds.width + GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, TEXT_PADDING);
2615 textBounds.y = bounds.y + bounds.height/2 - GuiGetStyle(DEFAULT, TEXT_SIZE)/2;
2616
2617 GuiDrawText(textRight, textBounds, TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT, Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(PROGRESSBAR, TEXT + (state*3))), guiAlpha));
2618 }
2619 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2620
2621 return value;
2622}

2624// Status Bar control
2625void GuiStatusBar(Rectangle bounds, const char *text)
2626{
2627 GuiState state = guiState;
2628
2629 // Draw control
2630 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2631 GuiDrawRectangle(bounds, GuiGetStyle(STATUSBAR, BORDER_WIDTH), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(STATUSBAR, (state != STATE_DISABLED)? BORDER_COLOR_NORMAL : BORDER_COLOR_DISABLED)), guiAlpha),
2632 Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(STATUSBAR, (state != STATE_DISABLED)? BASE_COLOR_NORMAL : BASE_COLOR_DISABLED)), guiAlpha));
2633 GuiDrawText(text, GetTextBounds(STATUSBAR, bounds), GuiGetStyle(STATUSBAR, TEXT_ALIGNMENT), Fade(GetColor(GuiGetStyle(STATUSBAR, (state != STATE_DISABLED)? TEXT_COLOR_NORMAL : TEXT_COLOR_DISABLED)), guiAlpha));
2634 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2635}

2637// Dummy rectangle control, intended for placeholding
2638void GuiDummyRec(Rectangle bounds, const char *text)
2639{
2640 GuiState state = guiState;
2641
2642 // Update control
2643 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2644 if ((state != STATE_DISABLED) && !guiLocked)
2645 {
2646 Vector2 mousePoint = GetMousePosition();
2647
2648 // Check button state
2649 if (CheckCollisionPointRec(mousePoint, bounds))
2650 {
2651 if (IsMouseButtonDown(MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON)) state = STATE_PRESSED;
2652 else state = STATE_FOCUSED;
2653 }
2654 }
2655 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
2656

2661 //------------------------------------------------------------------
2662}
